ClassDef.Name: Explosion

Properties.Name: Radius
Properties.Description: Determines the radius of this explosion

Properties.Name: Force
Properties.Description: Determines the force of this explosion that will be applied to affected hits

Properties.Name: AffectAnchored
Properties.Description: Determines if this explosion should affect anchored parts or not

Properties.Name: Damage
Properties.Description: Damage that is affected to player

Properties.Name: AffectPredicate
Properties.Description:
A predicate function deciding whenever this part should be accepted or not
Example usage: ```lua explosion.AffectPredicate = function(hit) -- always explode return true end ```

Events.Name: Hitted
Events.Description: Fires when this explosion affects a hit

ClassDef.Description: Explosion is a deadly explosion killing players and applying force to parts at the given position.
